item.description: This is the travel agenda. Day Date What Where Accomodation Comments 0 2023-09-29 fly from Zurich to New Orleans New Orleans International House Hotel flight ZRH 11:20 to MSY 18:48 1 2023-09-30 stay in new Orleans New Orleans International House Hotel 2 2023-10-01 stay again in new Orleans New Orleans International House Hotel 3 2023-10-02 pick up Harley and drive to Birmingham New Orleans to Meridian open 4 2023-10-03 drive with Harley Birmingham, AL not yet decided 5 2023-10-04 Visit Birmingham Birmingham, AL to be decided 6 2023-10-05 drive Birmingham to Cherokee Birmingham to Cherokee open 7 2023-10-06 drive Cherokee to Fancy Gap Fancy Gap open 8 2023-10-07 hiking Smokey Mountains Smokey Mountains open 9 2023-10-08 drive Fancy Gap to Shenandoah N.
